alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Montgomery; Robertson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 10:27AM CDT until August 12 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Montgomery County in Middle Tennessee... Northern Cheatham County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Robertson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 1100 AM CDT. * At 1026 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Clarksville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Springfield, Clarksville, Coopertown, Pleasant View, Cedar Hill and Cunningham. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 10 and 31. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
